thread.title: The Secret Reason ‘La La Land’ Will Win Best Picture - WSJ
thread.title_full: The Secret Reason ‘La La Land’ Will Win Best Picture - WSJ

author: Michael Salfino
title: The Secret Reason ‘La La Land’ Will Win Best Picture - WSJ
text:
Film The Secret Reason ‘La La Land’ Will Win Best Picture The Oscar favorite has an ace up its sleeve: Academy Awards voters go ga-ga for tales of entertainers ‘La La Land’ is a favorite to win the Academy Awards' Best Picture category, but the reason may have less to do with film quality, and more to do with the main characters' profession. Photo Credit: Dale Robinette By Michael Salfino Feb. 21, 2017 2:10 p.m. ET 
Why is “La La Land” considered such a sure bet for Best Picture at the Oscars Sunday? A data dive, albeit a very unscientific one, reveals what everyone suspected: The navel-gazers of Hollywood really, really like showbiz stories. 
Oddsmakers are pegging “La La Land” as an overwhelming favorite to land Sunday’s biggest prize. The reason may not have to do as much with quality as characters most relatable to Oscar voters.
